title: Structured Strategy Workshops to Overcome Resistance to Small-Group Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational cooperative learning principles and proficiency in mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: Process analyzing small-group learning resistance factors among office/administrative professionals and inducing perceptual change through structured strategies. Conducted as mobile-based microlearning in bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more conflict scenarios in small-group learning and develop resolution strategies
Learners can facilitate one or more effective small-group learning sessions following structured guidelines
Learners can improve their participation attitude in small-group learning by 20% or more based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
